titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 3624 Commercial Street Southeast in Salem, Oregon, as the "Sue Miller Post Office Building".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary:
7/23/2008--Introduced.
Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 3624 Commercial Street Southeast in Salem, Oregon, as the "Sue Miller Post Office Building."
